Subject: Client not receiving custom device control user remediation policy
Description:
I have created a custom device control user remediation policy and assigned this Via group to a test laptop, which is a member of this group.

Within the group>Manage Settings I have selected my custom User Remediation Notification Template, but still receive the default on the client workstation.   Other settings contained within this group are applying to this workstation.
